title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Colin on Rodgers vs. Russ, OBJ/Cam Expectations, Cowboys "Get Right" W with Matt Mosley
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Colin on Rodgers vs. Russ, OBJ/Cam Expectations, Cowboys "Get Right" W with Matt Mosley
description:
Colin offers his thoughts on what Mac Jones and the Pats' domination of the Browns means for Baker (3:00), which QB is more likely to demand a trade between Russell Wilson and Aaron Rodgers (8:00), and if OBJ on the Rams and Cam back in Carolina can have a real impact (11:00). Then, longtime Dallas Cowboys writer - and host of The Doomsday Podcast - Matt Mosley and Colin discuss the keys to the Cowboys' dominant bounce back win against the Falcons after a disappointing let down loss to Denver (14:00), if it's too early to call Dallas a Super Bowl contender (20:00), the Cowboys have any chance to keep OC Kellen Moore after this year (26:00), and if Texas should already be looking to move on from Steve Sarkisian after his first year (38:00).

Make sure to Subscribe and follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
